description:
Beam has deployed the world’s first AI-driven autonomous underwater vehicle for offshore wind farm inspections. The technology has already proved its mettle by inspecting jacket structures at Scotland’s largest offshore wind farm, Seagreen—a joint venture between SSE Renewables, TotalEnergies, and PTTEP. The AI-powered vehicle represents a significant leap forward in marine technology and underwater robotics.... Read more »

The post AI-powered underwater vehicle transforms offshore wind inspections appeared first on AI News.
title: AI-powered underwater vehicle transforms offshore wind inspections

description:
As AI applications evolve, they place greater demands on network infrastructure, particularly in terms of latency and connectivity. Supporting large-scale AI deployments introduces new issues, and analysts predict that AI-related traffic will soon account for a major portion of total network traffic. The industry must be prepared to handle this surge effectively. F5 is adapting... Read more »

The post Kunal Anand, F5: Shaping AI-optimised networks and enhancing security appeared first on AI News.
title: Kunal Anand, F5: Shaping AI-optimised networks and enhancing security
